about_the_game:
Magic Gallery

This Magic-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Images are mystical, magical and all-around fantastical!

Grab your wand, put on your pointed hat and get winding!

Contents

The Magic Gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Bunny in Hat
  • Dark Magic
  • Black Cat
  • Spell Casting
  • Hand and Wand
  • Frog Prince
  • Genie
  • Tarot
  • Crystal
  • Ingredients
  • Mage
  • Enchanted Scroll
  • School of Magic
  • Pyromancy
  • RPG Spell
  • Spell Vial
  • Cauldron
  • Cursed Tome
  • Orb
  • Spell Book
  • Ms Magic

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Magic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
